content.title: Configuring the Add Operation
content.body:
1. From the Project explorer, expand Responsive Web / Desktop > Forms > frmAddRecipient > flxAddRecipient > flxEntryFields > flxButtons, and select btnAdd.
  2. From the Data & Services panel, expand Project Services > RecipientStorage > Recipients.
  3. Select the create operation and drop it onto the Add button on the canvas.
  4. From the list of actions, select Action:onClick.
    The Action Editor window appears.
    The mapping editor opens on the right pane of the window.
